segments.text: Welcome to Super Stereos . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to look at your stereo systems . Do you have anything on sale ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , this system over here is on sale for $ 1,000 . As you can see , all of the components are brand-name .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But it doesn't have a turntable . I have a fair number of vinyl records , so I need something to play them on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our selection of stereo systems with turntables is somewhat limited , but we do have this system over here .
segments.speaker: S1
